Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Petite \Pe*tite"\, a. [F., fem. of petit.] Small, little; of a woman or girl, of small size and trim figure. [Webster 1913 Suppl.]

petite adj : very small; "diminutive in stature"; "a lilliputian chest of drawers"; "her petite figure"; "tiny feet"; "the flyspeck nation of Bahrain moved toward democracy" [syn: {bantam}, {diminutive}, {lilliputian}, {midget}, {tiny}, {flyspeck}] n : a garment size for short or slender women
